body:
Hi,

How do I give different schedules for different zones in the NatVent component? Is that possible?

Vinu
topic: Natural Ventilation Schedule for Different Zones

replies.body:
Vinu,

Just plug in a list of schedules to the "Set EP Airflow" component that corresponds to the list of Zones and it will assign each schedule to each zone respectively.

-Chris

Thank you Chris! Will try it!

Vinu
